long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Analysis News is a tool that intelligently extracts and summarizes news. When reading news, it is important to quickly understand the background and find the hidden impacts behind the news, which is crucial for analysis and decision-making in the financial industry. We created this tool to assist users in making more efficient decisions.
